column1: share on facebookshare on twittershare on emailmore sharing services express sympathy condolences photos l. dawn rass, 82, of namur, passed away on june 10, 2015, at the gathering in sturgeon bay. she was born june 26, 1932, in milwaukee to william and veda lawrence. on nov. 11, 1967, she married harold rass in namur. dawn loved music and enjoyed baking, especially making wedding cakes. she was instrumental in the founding of bethel shalom church and served as the pastor there for many years. survivors include her husband, harold, a daughter, linda nelson; one sister, rebecca richel; one sister-in-law, madeline jeanquart; brother-in-law, ed wojtal; and several nieces and nephews. she was preceded in death by her parents, favorite step-father albert rickel, in-laws, charles and lucy mathews, harry and rose vandertie, wilfred and esther massart, elmer and lena renier, clarence and evelyn rass, walter and laura guilette, and roy jeanquart. funeral services will be 11:00 a. m. tuesday, june 16, 2015, at the forbes funeral home in sturgeon bay with pastor paul peterson officiating. burial will be in st. mary of the snow cemetery. friends may call at the funeral home on tuesday from 9:00 a. m. until the time of service. special thanks to the entire staff at the gathering for their loving care and support throughout the last four years. also to caregivers, david and dixie englebert, larry and jody vandertie. many thanks to the many good friends and parishioners who supported dawn in many ways. click to send flowers using our local area florist free delivery to our funeral home & save on wire fees view/sign the condolence book. you have items in your basket. click here to review and/or checkout order directly from our recommended local area florist via our website and save on wire service fees and delivery charges to our funeral home. browse selection. send chocolates. express your condolences by sending a beautiful selection of chocolates, handcrafted in the usa. browse selection. veteran flag cases. we are proud to offer the finest heirloom-quality products to the families of our nation's veterans. browse products. bereavement productsa collection of books and bereavement products carefully designed to assist with the grieving process. browse products click the button to generate a printable document containing all condolences submittedcondolence booklet. add condolence
